name: TwoStepsBack
description:
This is an student videogame proyect in which you are an ninja student in your final exam to graduate and one of your classmates will try to prevent you from getting it. The principal mechanic is to activate three bonfire and then go to the gong at the top right part of the map to go to the next level meanwhile you collect more shurikens and try to avoid or kill your classmate copys.

This is a document in which you can value your game experience and give me some feedback to improve him. I apoligise if you complete it.

https://forms.gle/pkvZVnBT1S9ZYcBi6

Tank you!
